creationBlock().details: Returns the creation block of the deal

isProviderAllowed(address).details: Returns the boolean indicating whether the provider is allowed or not

maxWorkersPerProvider().details: Returns the max number of workers per provider

removeProviderFromAccessList(address).details: Removes a provider from the access list

targetWorkers().details: Returns the max number of workers

devdoc.details: Config contract is responsible for managing the configuration of the deal

removeProviderFromAccessList(address).details: Removes a provider from the access list

targetWorkers().details: Returns the max number of workers

AppCIDChanged((bytes4,bytes32)).details: Emitted when the app CID is changed

ProvidersAccessTypeChanged(uint8).details: Emitted when the providers access type is changed
